name: Drag Gear Racing
description:
Welcome to world of speed, race and excitement.Drag gear racing is an ultimate fun game for racing game lovers. This game has somewhat different scenario as compared to traditional racing games. We have focused on gear shifting in this game. Switch gears on time and won the race. Use nitro, shift gears on time and beat opponents.
Multiple vehicles are available to race. Upgrade your vehicle, won the race, earn more cash and unlock more vehicles. Monster truck is also added to have more fun. Timing of gear shifting and nitro boost is key for victory.
Eye catching color combinations, cool graphics and smooth controls will let you have more fun in this game.

Features

Wonderful Environment
Multiple Challenging levels
Multiple Vehicles
Stunning Graphics
